briefTitle: A Study of the Safety and Tolerability of Pimavanserin (ACP-103) in Patients With Parkinson's Disease Psychosis
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Open-Label Extension Study to Examine the Safety and Tolerability of ACP-103 in the Treatment of Psychosis in Parkinson's Disease
summary: To assess the long-term safety and tolerability of ACP-103 in subjects with Parkinson's disease psychosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety: Number (%) of Patients With Drug-related Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first to last study drug dose plus 30 days
